description:
Jahi comes up with a plan to capture Santa Claus but Doux just wants to help Santa hand out presents.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Santa Is Handing Out Too Many Presents!! / The Demon King`s Familiar Loves Humans Too Much!!
Santa ga Present o Kubari Sugiru!! / Maou no Tsukaima wa Ningen ga Suki Sugiru!!
サンタがプレゼントを配りすぎる!! / 魔王の使い魔は人間が好きすぎる!!
